description: Try our easy to follow Watermelon, Strawberry & Mint Granita recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Watermelon, Strawberry & Mint Granita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return to freezer for 2 hours then flake again. Spoon into chilled glasses and serve garnished with mint.
